snippet: Groupon said its co-founder Eric Lefkofsky was stepping down as chief executive and would return to the role of chairman, effective immediately.
abstract: Groupon co-founder Eric Lefkofsky is stepping down as chief executive and will be replaced by company's chief operating officer Rich Williams; Lefkofsky will return to his previous role of chairman.
lead_paragraph: Groupon said its co-founder Eric Lefkofsky was stepping down as chief executive and would return to the role of chairman, effective immediately.

headline.print_headline: Groupon Replaces Chief After Disappointing Quarter
headline.main: Groupon Replaces Chief After Disappointing Quarter
